item.title: Jeannettescape add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Those who believe in telekinetics, raise my hand." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Jeannettescape add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Sometimes you wake up. Sometimes the fall kills you. And sometimes, when you fall, you fly." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Jeannettescape add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Jeannettescape add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Most books on witchcraft will tell you that witches work naked. This is because most books on witchcraft were written by men." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Jeannettescape add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Things need not have happened to be true. Tales and dreams are the shadow-truths that will endure when mere facts are dust and ashes, and forgot." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Jeannettescape add a quote by Matthew Prior
item.description: "Be to her virtues very kind, Be to her faults a little blind." -- Matthew Prior

item.title: Jeannettescape add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "He couldn’t see why people made such a fuss about people eating their silly old fruit anyway, but life would be a lot less fun if they didn’t. And there was never an apple, in Adam’s opinion, that wasn’t worth the trouble you got into for eating it." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Jeannettescape add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Stories may well be lies, but they are good lies that say true things, and which can sometimes pay the rent." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Jeannettescape add a quote by Neil Gaiman
Jeannettescape add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "No medicine cures what happiness cannot." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Jeannettescape add a quote by Gabriel Garcia Marquez
item.description: "What matters in life is not what happens to you but what you remember and how you remember it." -- Gabriel Garcia Marquez

item.title: Jeannettescape add a quote by Gabriel Garcia Marquez
item.description: "Cease, cows, life is short." -- Gabriel Garcia Marquez

item.title: Jeannettescape add a quote by Gabriel Garcia Marquez
item.description: "My most important problem was destroying the lines of demarcation that separate what seems real from what seems fantastic." -- Gabriel Garcia Marquez

item.title: Jeannettescape add a quote by Gabriel Garcia Marquez
item.description: "He did not dare to console her, knowing that it would have been like consoling a tiger run thru by a spear." -- Gabriel Garcia Marquez

item.title: Jeannettescape add a quote by Gabriel Garcia Marquez
item.description: "Justice limps along, but gets there all the same." -- Gabriel Garcia Marquez

item.title: Jeannettescape add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "el corazón tiene más cuartos que un hotel de putas" -- Gabriel García Márquez
